title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Workshop on Designing Deep Learning-Based Personalized English Learning Pathways

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Teaching Experience and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Describe the principles of designing individualized English learning pathways through learner profile analysis
Apply a process for creating personalized learning content using deep learning-based recommendation systems

Analyze formative assessment data (quiz scores, observation records) to identify two or more learners’ weak areas and create a weekly learning plan including three customized learning activities to address them.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
